if(objectID == 2471) { if (playerHasItem(id)) { sendMessage("You go through the portal."); } else { if (!playerHasItem(id)) { sendMessage("You need an archery ticket to play."); } }

item.title: Has no item
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

Im working on a mini game, and you need an archery ticket to play, when you click the portal, and you have an archery ticket, it lets you go in, but how would i make it so if you click the portal, and dont have an archery ticket, it will say, “You need an archery ticket to play”?

I tried this

if(objectID == 2471){ if(playerHasItem = null) { sM("You need an archery ticket to play."); } }

Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 04:43:55 pm[/size][hr]Never mind, i found it out

Read full topic
